description.text:
I am a full-stack developer with experience in building high-quality web applications. I have
worked on different projects and stages of development, from planning and design to
implementation and maintenance, always seeking to offer efficient solutions tailored to the
needs of my clients. I live in Buenos Aires, Argentina, and have an advanced level of
English proficiency (C2).

skillsDescription.text: Here are some of the tools and technologies I have been working with recently:

responsabilities: Plan and develop multiple views of a dashboard using AngularJS and CSS.
Create and maintain multiple endpoints for a REST API in Java with SpringBoot accessed by up to ≈100 users simultaneously.
Develop and modify business flows for document upload and approval using Activiti BPMN.
Integrate OCR into the application to improve document reading by 100%.
Manage Production and Homologation environments for maintenance, correction of bugs and testing of new features.
Gradually migrate the FrontEnd from AngularJS to Angular 14.
Apply agile methodologies such as Kanban in product development.
Plan and develop various views and UI features using React and CSSModules.
Optimize pre-existing React views, improving performance and conversion rate by 40%.
Develop and maintain multiple microservices with Node.js with Express.js following Test Driven Development.
Maintain and develop several controllers for a REST API in Kotlin with Javalin, accessed by ≈700 users weekly in production.
Perform SQL database migrations (PostgreSQL and MySQL) using Flyway.
Implement unit tests to the code base, improving code coverage up to 80%.
Develop web scrapping bot with Python and Selenium to implement with different microservices.
Apply agile methodologies such as Scrum and Kanban in the product development.
Develop Java systems to keep track of shifts, using MySQL.
Develop and maintain a blog made with Next.js, using a SQLite database.
Develop multiple SEO-optimized landing pages with React, Next.js, and Angular.
Develop simple algorithms in Java, TypeScript and Kotlin.

ctaContactText.text: The more details you include, the easier it will be for us to get back to you.

seo.title: Mariano Guillaume - Full Stack Developer
seo.description: I am a full-stack developer with experience in building high-quality web applications.
